choices.text:
Below is an instruction that describes a task. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

### Instruction:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company

### Response:

Subject: Notification of Employee Resignation 
Dear [Boss's Name],
I hope this email finds you well. It is with a heavy heart that I must inform you that I will be resigning from my position at the company effective immediately. This decision has not been an easy one for me, but after much thought and consideration, it is what I believe to be in my best interest.
Throughout my time here, I have had the pleasure of working with a wonderful team and learning so much under your guidance. Your support and mentorship have meant more to me than words can express, and for that, I am truly grateful.
I understand that this may come as a surprise to you, but please know that my decision is not driven by any negative experiences or issues within the company. Instead, it is simply time for me to pursue new opportunities and challenges in order to continue growing both personally and professionally.
Once again, thank you for everything you have done for me during my time here at [Company Name]. I will cherish the memories we have made together and hope that our paths cross again soon.
Sincerely,
[Your Name]
